remarks: Not-free for restricted existential quantification where ` y ` and ` A ` are distinct.  See ~ nfrexxy for a version with ` x ` and ` y ` distinct instead.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Jun-2018.)
statement:
nfralya.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
nfralya.2 $e |- F/ x ph $.
nfrexya $p |- F/ x E. y e. A ph $.
$d A y $.
